etomica.modules.pistoncylinder

Class MeterRDFCylinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.meter.MeterRDF
      • etomica.modules.pistoncylinder.MeterRDFCylinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction, DataSourceIndependent, IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource, java.io.Serializable

    public class MeterRDFCylinder
extends MeterRDF
    MeterRDF sublcass that properly calculates the RDF for the Piston/Cylinder apparatus. Including all pairs would yield a very non-bulk RDF since atoms near the wall have open space next tho them. To account for this, if "padding" is the collision radius + RDF cutoff, then the RDF calculation includes all pairs where both are a distance "padding" away from all walls and half the pairs where only one is a distance "padding" away from all walls. The RDF is normalized to account for this.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
